text:
To enrich and perfect your online experience, Twinkle Toes Software uses "Cookies", similar technologies and services provided by others to display personalized content, appropriate advertising and store your preferences on your computer.
Twinkle Toes Software uses cookies to help Twinkle Toes Software identify and track visitors, their usage of https://www.bookedscheduler.com, and their website access preferences.
For example, we ask visitors who sign up for a blog at https://www.bookedscheduler.com to provide a username and email address.
Twinkle Toes Software only discloses logged in user and commenter IP addresses under the same circumstances that it uses and discloses personally-identifying information as described below.

In each case, Twinkle Toes Software collects such information only insofar as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose of the visitor's interaction with Twinkle Toes Software.
Those who engage in transactions with Twinkle Toes Software - by purchasing Twinkle Toes Software's services or products, are asked to provide additional information, including as necessary the personal and financial information required to process those transactions.

data_type: statistic about behavior of visitor to website
text: Twinkle Toes Software may collect statistics about the behavior of visitors to its website.
For example, we ask visitors who sign up for a blog at https://www.bookedscheduler.com to provide a username and email address.
